title: granny is licking her chops
ingredients_raw: ['pork chops', 'mango chutney', 'granny smith apple', 'sharp cheddar cheese']
substitution_notes: Replace mango chutney with lemon-mustard glaze; reduce apple or replace with sliced zucchini
improved_version_steps: Season pork chops with salt, pepper, and mustard. Sear until browned, then bake until cooked through. Replace chutney with a lemon-mustard glaze. Serve with sautéed zucchini instead of apples.

title: crock pot chicken bbq
ingredients_raw: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'water', 'worcestershire sauce', 'vinegar', 'cumin', 'barbecue sauce']
substitution_notes: Use sugar-free barbecue sauce or reduce quantity
improved_version_steps: Season chicken breast with cumin, vinegar, and Worcestershire. Grill or bake until fully cooked. Brush lightly with sugar-free barbecue sauce before serving.

title: savory smothered pork chops
ingredients_raw: ['pork chops', 'salt', 'pepper', 'fresh rosemary', 'olive oil', 'shallots', 'beef broth', 'butter']
substitution_notes: Replace butter with olive oil to lower saturated fat
improved_version_steps: Season pork chops with salt and pepper. Sear in olive oil until browned. Add shallots, rosemary, and beef broth. Simmer until chops are cooked through and liquid reduces. Finish with a small amount of butter if desired.

title: hook  line  and simple
ingredients_raw: ['salmon fillets', 'salt & freshly ground black pepper', 'light sour cream', 'pure maple syrup', 'dijon mustard', 'lemon juice', 'fresh dill', 'lemon zest', 'salt', 'black pepper']
violation_reason: added sugar from maple syrup; carbs exceed limit
substitution_notes: Remove maple syrup; replace with a tiny amount of lemon zest + mustard for flavor; or use sugar-free maple alternative
improved_version_steps: Season salmon with salt and pepper, whisk sour cream, mustard, lemon juice, dill, and zest. Spoon over salmon and bake until flaky. Remove the maple syrup to keep carbs low.

title: the best parmesan chicken
ingredients_raw: ['butter', 'dijon mustard', 'worcestershire sauce', 'salt', 'breadcrumbs', 'parmesan cheese', 'boneless skinless chicken breast halves']
substitution_notes: Replace breadcrumbs with almond flour or crushed pork rinds to reduce carbs
improved_version_steps: Mix dijon mustard, Worcestershire, and melted butter. Brush over chicken breasts. Coat lightly with a mixture of parmesan cheese and almond flour instead of breadcrumbs. Bake at 400°F until golden and cooked through.

title: balsamic vinegar and garlic oven chicken
ingredients_raw: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'lemon pepper seasoning', 'roasted garlic cloves', 'colby-monterey jack cheese', 'aluminum foil', 'butter', 'salt']
substitution_notes: Swap colby jack for low-fat mozzarella to reduce calories if desired. Optional: add Greek yogurt-based marinade for extra protein.
improved_version_steps: Season chicken with lemon pepper and salt. Layer roasted garlic on top, add a thin slice of cheese, and bake at 400°F until cooked through. Swap butter for a teaspoon of olive oil if you want it lighter.

title: glazed balsamic chicken
ingredients_raw: ['fresh orange juice', 'dark brown sugar', 'balsamic vinegar', 'dry mustard', 'fresh thyme', 'chicken pieces', 'salt & freshly ground black pepper']
violation_reason: carbs > 20g due to sugar and orange juice
substitution_notes: Remove brown sugar. replace orange juice with lemon juice. add 12 tsp monk fruit or erythritol if sweetness needed
improved_version_steps: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Whisk balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, mustard, thyme and a sugar-free sweetener. Sear chicken until browned, add glaze, and simmer until reduced and chicken is cooked through.

title: mama s mojito chicken
ingredients_raw: ['chicken', 'rum', 'mint', 'fresh lime juice', 'lime zest', 'sugar', 'jalapeno pepper', 'cayenne', 'garlic cloves', 'onion', 'cumin', 'cinnamon']
substitution_notes: Replace sugar with erythritol or omit altogether
improved_version_steps: Marinate chicken in lime juice, lime zest, mint, garlic, rum, and spices. Remove sugar or use a sugar-free sweetener. Grill or pan-sear until cooked through and reduce marinade for a glaze.

title: shrimp and scallop stroganoff
ingredients_raw: ['large shrimp', 'sea scallops', 'mushroom', 'butter', 'dry sherry', 'all-purpose flour', 'pepper', 'chicken bouillon cube', 'sour cream']
violation_reason: carbs too high due to flour thickener
substitution_notes: Replace flour with 1 tsp xanthan gum or reduce sauce; use light sour cream
improved_version_steps: Sauté shrimp and scallops. Add mushrooms and sherry. Thicken with 1 tsp xanthan gum instead of flour. Stir in light sour cream and simmer. Serve over vegetables or zucchini noodles.

title: chicken with strawberry salad
ingredients_raw: ['chicken breasts', 'egg whites', 'panko breadcrumbs', 'salt', 'fresh ground black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'fennel', 'baby arugula', 'slivered almonds', 'fresh strawberries']
violation_reason: carbs exceed limit due to panko breadcrumbs
substitution_notes: Replace panko with almond flour or crushed pork rinds; reduce strawberry amount if needed
improved_version_steps: Coat chicken in almond flour and pan-sear. Toss arugula, fennel, strawberries, and almonds with balsamic dressing. Serve chicken over salad.

title: cuban roast pork
ingredients_raw: ['pork shoulder', 'garlic cloves', 'onion', 'dark rum', 'olive oil', 'fresh orange juice', 'fresh lime juice', 'oregano', 'cumin', 'salt', 'black pepper', 'chicken stock']
substitution_notes: Omit orange juice for stricter carbs
improved_version_steps: Marinate pork with garlic, citrus juice, spices, and rum. Sear in olive oil, add stock, then roast until tender. Reduce braising liquid and serve.

title: cheesy baked chicken breasts
ingredients_raw: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'milk', 'whole grain mustard', 'cheddar cheese', 'all-purpose flour', 'fresh chives']
substitution_notes: Use almond flour instead of all-purpose flour; reduce milk or replace with unsweetened almond milk
improved_version_steps: Season chicken breasts with salt and mustard. Coat lightly with almond flour. Top with a thin layer of cheddar. Bake at 400°F until fully cooked, then finish with chopped chives.

title: chunky shrimp spread
ingredients_raw: ['water', 'fresh shrimp', 'onion', 'fresh lemon juice', 'curry powder', 'mayonnaise', 'salt', 'white pepper', 'parsley sprig']
violation_reason: protein likely <30g; high-fat mayo adds calories without protein
substitution_notes: Use Greek yogurt instead of mayonnaise; increase shrimp amount
improved_version_steps: Mix cooked chopped shrimp with Greek yogurt, lemon juice, onion, salt, pepper, and curry. Chill before serving.

title: chicken breasts with feta and tomato
ingredients_raw: ['dried breadcrumbs', 'fresh oregano', 'anise seed', 'salt', 'black pepper', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'olive oil', 'red onion', 'garlic', 'ouzo', 'plum tomatoes', 'kalamata olives', 'feta cheese', 'fresh dill']
substitution_notes: Replace breadcrumbs with almond flour or omit them; reduce olives if needed
improved_version_steps: Season chicken with oregano, salt, and pepper. Sear in olive oil. Add onion, garlic, and chopped tomatoes; simmer until reduced. Stir in feta and dill. Serve without breadcrumbs, using almond flour if a coating is needed.

title: mrs cobb s meatloaf
ingredients_raw: ['brown sugar', 'cranberry sauce', 'eggs', 'onions', 'milk', 'ground thyme', 'sage', 'nutmeg', 'salt', 'pepper', 'plain breadcrumbs', 'extra lean ground beef']
carb_sources: brown sugar, cranberry sauce, breadcrumbs, milk
violation_reason: carbs exceed 20g due to sugar and breadcrumbs
substitution_notes: Remove brown sugar and cranberry sauce; replace breadcrumbs with almond flour or crushed pork rinds; use unsweetened milk substitute
improved_version_steps: Mix lean ground beef with eggs, spices, onions, and almond flour instead of breadcrumbs. Omit sugar and cranberry sauce. Shape into a loaf and bake until cooked through.

title: chicken in corn flakes
ingredients_raw: ['skinless chicken breasts', 'mayonnaise', 'corn flakes', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'garlic powder', 'salt', 'black pepper']
substitution_notes: Replace corn flakes with almond flour or crushed pork rinds for even lower carbs.
improved_version_steps: Coat chicken breasts lightly with mayonnaise, press into a mixture of crushed low-carb crumbs, garlic powder, sesame seeds, salt, and pepper, then bake at 400°F until fully cooked and crisp.

title: herb roasted turkey
ingredients_raw: ['chicken broth', 'lemon juice', 'basil', 'thyme', 'garlic salt', 'pepper', 'poultry seasoning', 'turkey']
substitution_notes: Use rosemary or sage if basil/thyme not available; use low-sodium broth.
improved_version_steps: Season turkey with herbs, garlic salt, and pepper. Roast at 350°F, basting occasionally with lemon juice and a small amount of chicken broth. Cook until internal temperature reaches 165°F. Let rest before slicing.

title: mm good chicken cutlets
ingredients_raw: ['chicken cutlets', 'breadcrumbs', 'good seasonings italian salad dressing mix', 'lemon juice', 'wine']
substitution_notes: Replace breadcrumbs with almond flour; increase chicken portion to 200 g
improved_version_steps: Season chicken cutlets with salt and italian dressing mix. Coat lightly in almond flour instead of breadcrumbs. Pan-sear in a small amount of olive oil, then finish with lemon juice and a splash of white wine. Cook until chicken reaches 74°C and sauce reduces.

title: sue s tuesday meatloaf
ingredients_raw: ['extra lean ground beef', 'onion', 'garlic', 'egg substitute', 'ketchup', 'reduced-fat white bread', 'skim milk', 'nonstick cooking spray']
substitution_notes: Replace white bread with almond flour or omit entirely. Use sugar-free ketchup if lowering carbs further.
improved_version_steps: Mix lean ground beef, onion, garlic, egg substitute, and a spoon of sugar-free ketchup. Add 12 tbsp almond flour instead of bread for binding. Form into a loaf and bake at 375°F until fully cooked. Let rest before slicing.

title: tuna vera cruz
ingredients_raw: ['tequila', 'lime juice', 'lime zest', 'fresh ginger', 'garlic', 'salt', 'sugar', 'ground cumin', 'ground cinnamon', 'black pepper', 'vegetable oil', 'tuna steaks', 'lemon wedge', 'lime wedge']
substitution_notes: Omit sugar or replace with monk fruit sweetener
improved_version_steps: Mix lime juice, lime zest, ginger, garlic, cumin, cinnamon, pepper, and a small splash of tequila. Omit the sugar or use a zero-carb sweetener. Coat tuna steaks in the marinade and sear in a lightly oiled pan for 23 minutes per side. Serve with lemon or lime wedges.

title: crunchy onion cheeseburger
ingredients_raw: ['ground beef', 'fried onions', 'worcestershire sauce', 'garlic powder', 'cheese']
substitution_notes: Reduce or remove fried onions if needing stricter low-carb version
improved_version_steps: Mix ground beef with worcestershire sauce and garlic powder, form patties, cook in a pan, top with cheese, and serve with minimal fried onions or omit them for ultra-low-carb.

title: fake rotisserie chicken
ingredients_raw: ['chicken', 'onion', 'lemon', 'tarragon', 'soy sauce']
substitution_notes: Omit soy sauce for lower sodium; add garlic; use yogurt marinade for extra tenderness
improved_version_steps: Marinate chicken in lemon juice, soy sauce, tarragon and onion slices for 30 minutes. Roast at 425°F until skin is browned and meat reaches 165°F. Optional: finish under broiler for rotisserie-style crispiness.

title: smothered grilled chicken breast
ingredients_raw: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'bacon', "lawry's seasoned salt", 'barbecue sauce', 'sliced mushrooms', 'onion', 'bell pepper', 'mozzarella cheese', 'american cheese']
substitution_notes: Use a sugar-free BBQ sauce to ensure carbs stay low. Optionally replace American cheese with reduced-fat mozzarella.
improved_version_steps: Season chicken breasts with seasoned salt and grill until fully cooked. Top with sautéed mushrooms, onions, and bell peppers. Add cooked bacon and a small amount of sugar-free BBQ sauce, then melt mozzarella on top before serving.

title: quick and easy chicken cordon bleu rolls
ingredients_raw: ['chicken breasts', 'prosciutto', 'swiss cheese', 'salt and pepper', 'cream of mushroom soup', 'milk', 'dry white wine']
substitution_notes: Use low-carb cream of mushroom soup or replace with heavy cream + mushrooms. Replace milk with unsweetened almond milk if carbs must be minimal.
improved_version_steps: Pound chicken breasts thin, add prosciutto and Swiss cheese, roll tightly, season with salt and pepper. Sear briefly, then bake until cooked through. Simmer low-carb mushroom-cream sauce separately and pour over rolls before serving.

title: cajun habanero sausage
ingredients_raw: ['pork butt', 'onion', 'habanero peppers', 'garlic', 'cayenne powder', 'dried thyme', 'fresh parsley', 'paprika', 'ground black pepper', 'salt', 'liquid smoke', 'red wine vinegar']
carb_sources: onion, habanero peppers, red wine vinegar
substitution_notes: use leaner pork or add egg white to increase protein density if needed
improved_version_steps:
Mix ground pork with onion, garlic, peppers, spices, salt, and vinegar until sticky. 
Chill, shape into sausages, and cook in a skillet over medium heat until browned and fully cooked.

title: perfect competition chili
ingredients_raw: ['oil', 'ground beef', 'beef broth', 'beef bouillon granules', 'chicken bouillon granule', 'tomato sauce', 'onions', 'garlic powder', 'chili powder', 'tabasco sauce', 'salt and pepper', 'onion powder', 'cumin', 'paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
substitution_notes: Use lean beef (90%) to reduce calories; choose low-sodium broth; use no-sugar tomato sauce.
improved_version_steps: Brown lean ground beef in a little oil. Add onions and sauté. Stir in spices, broth, bouillon, and no-sugar tomato sauce. Simmer until thick. Adjust seasoning with salt, pepper, and a few drops of Tabasco.

title: chuck roast with porcini mushrooms
ingredients_raw: ['boneless beef chuck roast', 'salt', 'fresh ground black pepper', 'olive oil', 'onions', 'garlic cloves', 'dry red wine', 'canned beef broth', 'dried porcini mushrooms', 'rosemary sprig']
substitution_notes: Replace red wine with beef broth if lower carbs desired; add mushrooms or spinach to increase volume without increasing carbs.
improved_version_steps: Sear beef chuck roast in olive oil until browned. Add onions, garlic, beef broth, dried porcini mushrooms, rosemary, salt, and pepper. Simmer or braise until the meat is tender and the liquid reduces into a rich sauce. Serve sliced or shredded with roasted vegetables or cauliflower mash.

title: peppered salmon with roasted root vegetables
ingredients_raw: ['carrots', 'beets', 'olive oil', 'sea salt', 'salmon fillets', 'fresh coarse ground black pepper', 'frozen orange juice concentrate', 'water', 'green onion']
substitution_notes: Reduce carrots and beets; omit orange juice concentrate; add extra salmon or leafy greens
improved_version_steps: Roast diced carrots and beets with olive oil and salt. Season salmon with pepper and bake until flaky. Skip the orange juice concentrate and finish with green onions. Serve with a side of greens.

title: chinese five spice chicken wings with cilantro sauce
ingredients_raw: ['chicken wings', 'chinese five spice powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt', 'fresh ground black pepper', 'fresh cilantro leaves', 'light sour cream', 'mayonnaise', 'yogurt', 'lemon, juice of', 'kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper']
substitution_notes: Use Greek yogurt instead of sour cream and mayo to reduce carbs and increase protein; use skinless wings or chicken drumettes for leaner protein.
improved_version_steps: Season chicken wings with five-spice, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Roast or air-fry until crisp. For the sauce, blend Greek yogurt with cilantro, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Serve wings with the high-protein cilantro yogurt sauce.

title: chicken  n golden sauce
ingredients_raw: ['chicken breasts', 'flour', 'paprika', 'pepper', 'butter', 'cream of chicken soup', 'parsley']
violation_reason: carbs likely exceed 20 g due to flour + creamy soup base
substitution_notes: Use almond flour instead of wheat flour; replace canned soup with yogurt-based sauce
improved_version_steps: Season chicken and sear in butter. Make a lighter sauce with almond flour and broth or yogurt. Simmer chicken until cooked and garnish with parsley.

title: cheese and mushroom stuffed meatloaf
ingredients_raw: ['olive oil', 'onion', 'garlic', 'sliced mushrooms', 'ground beef', 'fresh breadcrumb', 'parsley', 'ketchup', 'egg', 'salt', 'pepper', 'dried thyme', 'dried sage', 'cheddar cheese']
substitution_notes: Replace breadcrumbs with almond flour or pork rinds; use sugar-free ketchup; increase beef slightly
improved_version_steps: Mix beef with egg, spices, mushrooms, and almond flour instead of breadcrumbs. Stuff with cheddar, top with sugar-free ketchup, and bake to 160°F.

title: steak with onions  bistec encebollado
ingredients_raw: ['garlic', 'black pepper', 'adobo seasoning', 'oregano', 'vinegar', 'boneless beef top loin steaks', 'oil', 'onions']
substitution_notes: Use olive oil instead of generic oil; add more steak or serve with sautéed peppers for volume without carbs
improved_version_steps: Season steak with adobo, oregano, garlic, and black pepper. Sear in olive oil. Add sliced onions and cook until softened. Deglaze with a splash of vinegar and reduce. Serve with non-starchy vegetables to keep carbs low.

title: honey balsamic baked chicken breasts with tomatoes  mushrooms a
ingredients_raw: ['chicken breasts', 'red bell pepper', 'yellow bell pepper', 'mushroom', 'diced tomatoes', 'olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'fresh rosemary', 'salt', 'fresh ground black pepper', 'honey']
substitution_notes: Reduce honey or replace with stevia; roast without added sugar; add more chicken or mushrooms to increase protein density
improved_version_steps: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Sear briefly, then bake with bell peppers, mushrooms, and tomatoes. Make a glaze with balsamic vinegar and a small amount of honey or stevia. Bake until the chicken reaches 74°C and vegetables soften.

title: pineapple mustard pork loin
ingredients_raw: ['pork loin', 'brown sugar', 'vinegar', 'spicy brown mustard', 'crushed pineapple in juice']
violation_reason: carbs exceed 20g due to sugar and pineapple juice
substitution_notes: Remove brown sugar, replace pineapple juice with sugar-free pineapple flavor or small amount of fresh pineapple; add mustard + vinegar + spices for glaze.
improved_version_steps: Mix mustard, vinegar, garlic powder, and salt. Coat pork loin and roast. Add a few small pineapple chunks near the end for flavor without high carbs.

title: nana s melt in your mouth blue cheese pork chops
ingredients_raw: ['pork chops', 'chicken broth', 'flour', 'blue cheese', 'oil']
substitution_notes: Use almond flour instead of wheat flour to reduce carbs further.
improved_version_steps:
Season pork chops and sear in oil. Remove and deglaze the pan with chicken broth.
Stir in blue cheese until melted. Return pork chops, simmer until tender.
Use almond flour lightly for coating if you want it fully low-carb.

title: tropical tilapia
ingredients_raw: ['tilapia fillets', 'lemon juice', 'old bay seasoning', 'blue cheese', 'parsley flakes', 'shredded coconut']
substitution_notes: Use unsweetened shredded coconut or reduce amount
improved_version_steps: Season tilapia with lemon juice and Old Bay. Press lightly into unsweetened shredded coconut. Bake at 400°F for 1215 minutes until flaky. Top with a small amount of blue cheese and parsley.

title: roast beef salad
ingredients_raw: ['cooked beef', 'sour cream', 'red onion', 'salt', 'lemon juice', 'horseradish', 'pepper']
substitution_notes: Use Greek yogurt instead of sour cream for higher protein
improved_version_steps: Mix chopped cooked beef with sour cream, lemon juice, grated horseradish, salt, and pepper. Fold in finely diced red onion. Chill and serve over leafy greens.

title: mango glazed fresh atlantic salmon
ingredients_raw: ['white wine vinegar', 'honey', 'ginger', 'mango', 'lime juice', 'soy sauce', 'coriander', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salmon fillets', 'salt and pepper']
improved_version_steps: Mix vinegar, lime juice, ginger, soy sauce and a small amount of honey into a glaze. Brush it over the salmon and bake until cooked through. Serve with coriander and lime.

title: crock pot  super garlic chicken legs
ingredients_raw: ['chicken legs', 'garlic cloves', 'dried rosemary', 'salt', 'pepper', 'red pepper flakes', 'chicken broth', 'oil']
substitution_notes: Optionally remove oil or reduce amount to lower calories; add extra chicken for higher protein
improved_version_steps: Season chicken legs with salt, pepper, garlic, and rosemary. Place in slow cooker with broth. Cook on low until tender. Optional: brown under broiler before serving.

title: sugar  n  spice pork tenderloin from the james beard house
ingredients_raw: ['water', 'coarse salt', 'granulated sugar', 'cider vinegar', 'pork tenderloin', 'brown sugar', 'ground cinnamon', 'star anise', 'szechuan peppercorns', 'black pepper', 'olive oil']
substitution_notes: Replace sugar + brown sugar with erythritol or omit entirely; add garlic + chili for flavor instead
improved_version_steps: Marinate pork tenderloin in vinegar, salt, pepper, and a sugar-free spice mix (cinnamon, star anise, szechuan pepper). Sear in a pan with olive oil, then roast at 400°F until cooked through. No sugar glaze.

title: baked chicken with sun dried tomato pesto
ingredients_raw: ['boneless chicken breasts', 'sun-dried tomato packed in oil', 'oil', 'fresh basil leaf', 'parmesan cheese', 'garlic', 'fresh ground black pepper']
substitution_notes: Use light parmesan; reduce oil; add 1 tbsp Greek yogurt to pesto base
improved_version_steps: Blend sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, basil, 1 tsp olive oil, and parmesan into a thick pesto. Coat chicken breasts with the mixture, season with pepper, and bake at 400°F (200°C) for 2025 minutes until cooked through. Serve with a side of greens.

title: super grilled salmon
ingredients_raw: ['brown sugar', 'hot water', 'shiraz wine', 'soy sauce', 'olive oil', 'garlic cloves', 'lemon pepper', 'salmon fillets', 'cornstarch', 'cold water']
carb_sources: brown sugar, wine, soy sauce, cornstarch
substitution_notes: Reduce brown sugar to 1 tsp; replace cornstarch with xanthan gum; use dry spices instead of sugary glaze
improved_version_steps: Marinate salmon in olive oil, garlic, lemon pepper, and a splash of soy sauce. Grill until cooked through. Thicken remaining marinade with a pinch of xanthan gum instead of sugar or cornstarch. Brush lightly over salmon before serving.

title: company chicken with dried beef
ingredients_raw: ['dried beef', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'bacon', 'cream cheese', 'sour cream', 'cream of mushroom soup', 'paprika']
substitution_notes: Replace cream cheese and sour cream with reduced-fat Greek yogurt. Use a low-sodium mushroom soup or homemade version. Remove bacon if sodium is a concern.
improved_version_steps: Replace cream cheese and sour cream with reduced-fat Greek yogurt. Use a low-sodium mushroom soup or homemade version. Remove bacon if sodium is a concern.

title: tuna and artichoke panini
ingredients_raw: ['kalamata olive', 'olive oil', 'garlic cloves', 'lemon zest', 'mayonnaise', 'tuna in olive oil', 'marinated artichokes', 'fresh lemon juice', 'fresh ground black pepper', 'ciabatta', 'tomatoes']
substitution_notes: Replace ciabatta with lettuce wrap or low-carb chaffle.
improved_version_steps: Mix tuna, lemon, garlic, olives, and mayo. Add chopped artichokes and pepper. Serve in lettuce cups or low-carb chaffles; toast lightly if using chaffles.

title: joe s special
ingredients_raw: ['olive oil', 'lean ground beef', 'onion', 'garlic cloves', 'mushrooms', 'frozen chopped spinach', 'worcestershire sauce', 'dried italian seasoning', 'ground nutmeg', 'eggs', 'salt & freshly ground black pepper']
substitution_notes: Use extra-lean beef or replace half with turkey; remove Worcestershire if avoiding added sugar.
improved_version_steps: Brown lean ground beef in olive oil. Add onion, garlic, mushrooms, and spinach; cook until soft. Season with Italian herbs and nutmeg. Stir in beaten eggs and cook until just set. Keep it simple and high-protein.

title: spinach   sausage stuffed pasta shells
ingredients_raw: ['pasta shells', 'bulk pork sausage', 'frozen spinach', 'eggs', 'ricotta cheese', 'mozzarella cheese', 'cheddar cheese', 'spaghetti sauce']
substitution_notes: Replace pasta shells with hollowed zucchini boats or baked bell pepper halves; use low-sugar tomato sauce
improved_version_steps: Sauté sausage and spinach. Mix with ricotta and egg. Spoon into halved zucchini or bell pepper boats. Top with a thin layer of low-sugar tomato sauce and bake until tender. Add a small amount of mozzarella before serving.

title: chicken stroganoff with mushrooms  sherry   sage
ingredients_raw: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'cremini mushrooms', 'kosher salt', 'shallot', 'fresh sage', 'fresh ground black pepper', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs', 'garlic', 'dry sherry', 'roasted red pepper', 'sour cream', 'plum tomato']
carb_sources: sour cream, roasted red pepper, plum tomato
substitution_notes: Replace sour cream with 0% Greek yogurt to reduce carbs and increase protein
improved_version_steps: Sauté mushrooms and shallot in olive oil, add garlic and sage, then brown chicken thighs. Deglaze with dry sherry, stir in Greek yogurt instead of sour cream, and simmer until thickened. Serve with roasted red pepper and tomato folded in at the end.

title: cracker barrel grilled chicken tenders
ingredients_raw: ['chicken tenders', 'italian dressing', 'fresh lime juice', 'honey']
substitution_notes: Reduce honey to 1 teaspoon or replace with a few drops of liquid stevia.
improved_version_steps: Marinate chicken tenders in Italian dressing, lime juice, and a reduced amount of honey or stevia. Grill over medium heat until cooked through.

title: apple glazed corned beef
ingredients_raw: ['corned beef', 'water', 'apple juice', 'soy sauce', 'worcestershire sauce', 'vinegar', 'ground mustard', 'brown sugar']
violation_reason: carbs too high (apple juice + brown sugar)
substitution_notes: Replace apple juice with vinegar + water, remove brown sugar or use erythritol
improved_version_steps: Simmer corned beef with low-sugar liquids and aromatics; reduce and broil for a sugar-free glaze

title: uncle bill s crispy halibut steaks
ingredients_raw: ['halibut steaks', 'eggs', 'dijon mustard', 'garlic powder', 'dried dill weed', 'corn flakes', 'parmesan cheese', 'italian seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'butter']
violation_reason: carb coating (corn flakes) likely exceeds 20g net carbs
substitution_notes: Replace corn flakes with crushed pork rinds or almond flour; reduce butter; bake instead of pan-fry
improved_version_steps: Pat halibut dry and coat with a mixture of dijon, egg, and spices. Dredge in crushed pork rinds or almond flour instead of corn flakes. Brush lightly with olive oil and bake at 400°F until crisp and cooked through.
